column1: Table 2. Components of the IO-Era Prognostic Score
HRs from multivariable Cox regression adjusting for all factors.

Abbreviations: HR = hazard ratio; CI = confidence interval; KPS = Karnofsky Performance Status; Hb = hemoglobin; LLN = lower limit of normal; LDH = lactate dehydrogenase; mGPS = modified Glasgow Prognostic Score.
mGPS scoring: 0 = CRP ≤10 mg/L and albumin ≥35 g/L; 1 = CRP >10 mg/L or albumin <35 g/L; 2 = CRP >10 mg/L and albumin <35 g/L.
